name: PRIVATE CAN GIO MANGROVE FOREST - MONKEY ISLAND TOUR
description:
Explore the lush jungles, exotic wildlife, and colorful scenery of Can
Gio National Park. Embark on a journey through a natural sanctuary with the
chance to play with monkeys, visit a crocodile farm, cruise through the jungle
on a speed boat, as well as tour a Vietnam Base and Can Gio Market.
